mapper.sql: d.id, d.dept_name, d.level, d.parent_id, d.dept_desc, d.status, d.create_user,d.create_time, d.update_user, d.update_time
mapper.insert: insert into auth_dept ( dept_name, level,parent_id, dept_desc, status, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time) values (#{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deptDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
